short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync PFF's exclusive data, expert advice, and award-winning rankings with your Fantasy Football league to help you draft smarter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sync your ESPN & Yahoo fantasy football leagues with the PFF Chrome extension to unlock PFF's data to help you draft smarter.

This extension gives you personalized data and insights based on your league information to draft smarter and make confident in-season decisions.

*Expert Advice During Your Draft
Get real-time pick suggestions for each round of your ESPN and Yahoo fantasy draft, projected points and pick grades. (PFF+ Premium users only)

*Player Draft Availability
Get player availability predictions for each round live during your draft. (PFF+ Premium users only)

*Rankings Powered by Award Winner Nathan Jahnke
Draft smarter with rankings power by award winner and expert analyst Nathan Jahnke, ADP from your league host site, and projected points.

*Line-up Optimizer with Start/Sit and Waiver Wire recommendations
Get start/sit recommendations and top waiver wire targets powered by PFF. (PFF+ Premium Users Only)

By installing this extension, you agree to PFFâ€™s Terms and Conditions (https://www.pff.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.pff.com/privacy).

The PFF Chrome extension does not share code or features with any other Chrome extension.
